The picture of an eagle gripping a drone: 2. The Indonesian-language caption translates to English as "Israel's surveillance drone flies low over Gaza Palestine. Allah helps the drone Caught by an Eagle. We hope all humans see it."
The Arabic text superimposed on the pict: An Israeli spy drone in the sky of Palestine-Gaza, but thanks to God, it was captured by an eagle."
A Google reverse image search revealed t: ANP), a Dutch news agency, on March 7, 2016. The picture was distributed by AFP on the same date with a caption about a company called Guard From Above training birds of prey to intercept hostile drones.
